com.percussion.loader
Interface IPSContentTree

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface IPSContentTree
extends Serializable

This interface specifies the data model used for the content item tree.

Method Summary
 IPSContentTreeNode getChild(IPSContentTreeNode parent, int index)
          Get the child with the supplied index in the provided parent.
 int getChildCount(IPSContentTreeNode parent)
          Get the number of children from the supplied parent node.
 int getIndexOfChild(IPSContentTreeNode parent, IPSContentTreeNode child)
          Lookup the index for the supplied child node within the provided parent.
 List getNodes()
          Get all nodes of this tree.
 Iterator getRoots()
          Get the root nodes of this tree.
 boolean isLeaf(IPSContentTreeNode node)
          Test if the supplied node is a leaf.
 

Method Detail

getChild

IPSContentTreeNode getChild(IPSContentTreeNode parent,
                            int index)
Get the child with the supplied index in the provided parent.

Parameters:
parent - the parent node from which to get the child, not null.
index - the index of the child node to get from the supplied parent, must be >= 0.
Returns:
the child node from teh supplied parent at the specified index, null if not found.

getChildCount

int getChildCount(IPSContentTreeNode parent)
Get the number of children from the supplied parent node.

Parameters:
parent - the parent node to get the number of children for, not null.
Returns:
the number of children found in the supplied parent, always >= 0.

getIndexOfChild

int getIndexOfChild(IPSContentTreeNode parent,
                    IPSContentTreeNode child)
Lookup the index for the supplied child node within the provided parent.

Parameters:
parent - teh parent node to lookup the inde from, not null.
child - the child node to lookup the index for, not null.
Returns:
the index of the supplied child withi the provided parent, -1 if not found.

getRoots

Iterator getRoots()
Get the root nodes of this tree.

Returns:
an iterator of nodes of this tree, null if not set yet.

isLeaf

boolean isLeaf(IPSContentTreeNode node)
Test if the supplied node is a leaf.

Parameters:
node - the node to test, not null.
Returns:
true if the supplied node is a leaf, false otherwise.

getNodes

List getNodes()
Get all nodes of this tree.

Returns:
A list of IPSContentTreeNode objects. It can never be null, but may be empty.
